title: 32 - Toxic Authority - Spiritual Abuse Part 5
description:
In this episode we talk about ways to identify toxic authority both in Jesus' day and in our current culture.  We present ways in which the church/authority burdens it's people in a way that Jesus would call into question.  This should be the last episode on Spiritual Abuse.

- Mike Erre

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com
